title: Entity Data
description: Schema for defining Minecraft entity data.

id.title: Entity ID
id.description: The unique identifier for the entity, e.g., 'minecraft:zombie'.

pos.title: Position
pos.description: The position of the entity in the world.

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: The rotation of the entity (yaw and pitch).

custom_name.title: Custom Name
custom_name.description: The custom name of the entity, if any.

health.title: Health
health.description: The current health of the entity.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A list of tags associated with the entity.

is_baby.title: Is Baby
is_baby.description: Whether the entity is a baby (for ageable entities).

armor_items.title: Armor Items
armor_items.description: The armor items worn by the entity.

hand_items.title: Hand Items
hand_items.description: The items held in the entity's hands.

effects.title: Effects
effects.description: The status effects applied to the entity.

id.title: Effect ID
id.description: The ID of the effect, e.g., 'minecraft:speed'.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the effect in ticks.
